sentences.en: 13 men have been questioned in connection with the murder.
sentences.cn: 有13名男子因谋杀案受到盘问。

sentences.en: Det Supt Bassett was in charge of the murder enquiry.
sentences.cn: 探长巴西特负责调查该谋杀案。

sentences.en: Detectives have launched a murder investigation .
sentences.cn: 警方探员已经启动凶杀案调查。

sentences.en: Fisher was behind bars last night, charged with attempted murder.
sentences.cn: 费希尔被控谋杀未遂，昨晚入狱。

sentences.en: He was convicted of murdering a policeman.
sentences.cn: 他被判谋杀一名警察的罪名成立。

sentences.en: He was electrocuted for a murder committed when he was 17.
sentences.cn: 他因17岁时犯下的谋杀罪而被处以电刑。

sentences.en: He was found guilty of attempted murder .
sentences.cn: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.en: He was found guilty of attempted murder.
sentences.cn: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.en: He was wanted for the murder of a magistrate.
sentences.cn: 他因谋杀一名地方法官而被通缉。

sentences.en: Her hatred of them would never lead her to murder.
sentences.cn: 她虽说仇恨他们，但绝不至于去杀人。

sentences.en: How could David be mixed up in a murder?
sentences.cn: 戴维怎么会卷进一宗谋杀案呢？

sentences.en: I know of no one who would want to murder Albert.
sentences.cn: 我没听说有人想杀艾伯特。

sentences.en: if it gets into the papers, she'll be down here screaming blue murder.
sentences.cn: 如果这事情上了报，她会到这里来吵翻天的。

sentences.en: In 1977 he was convicted of murder and sentenced to life imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 1977年，他被判谋杀罪名成立，判处终身监禁。

sentences.en: It was a period of collective insanity, of legalized murder and mayhem.
sentences.cn: 那是个集体丧失理智、谋杀与暴力合法化的时期。

sentences.en: On the night the murder was committed , he was out of the country.
sentences.cn: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.en: Police are searching for the murder weapon .
sentences.cn: 警方在寻找杀人凶器。

sentences.en: Police are searching for the murder weapon.
sentences.cn: 警方在寻找杀人凶器。

sentences.en: She denied the murder of four children who were in her care.
sentences.cn: 她否认杀害了她所照管的4个孩子。

sentences.en: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder .
sentences.cn: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.en: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder.
sentences.cn: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.en: She was sentenced to twenty years' imprisonment for poisoning and attempted murder.
sentences.cn: 她因投毒和谋杀未遂被判20年监禁。

sentences.en: Stevens's murder was the result of a deep-seated and intense hatred.
sentences.cn: 史蒂文斯遭谋杀源于深仇宿怨。

sentences.en: The man accused of her murder will appear in court today.
sentences.cn: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.en: The mother of the murder victim wept in court.
sentences.cn: 凶案死者的母亲在法庭上痛哭。

sentences.en: the murdered man
sentences.cn: 被害男子

sentences.en: There is even a flashback to the murder itself.
sentences.cn: 甚至有一段关于谋杀本身的闪回。

sentences.en: Thousands of civilians were brutally murdered during the civil war.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的平民在内战中遭到残杀。

sentences.en: Williams faces life in prison if convicted of attempted murder.
sentences.cn: 如被判谋杀未遂，威廉斯将面临终身监禁。

words.tran_cn: 杀人的，残忍的；凶残的；蓄意谋杀的

phrases.tran_cn: 可怕的谋杀；恐怖的喊声

phrases.phrase: get away with murder【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 逍遥法外：逃避对极端恶劣以至应受责备行为的侦查或惩罚
大屠杀；大规模的谋杀；集体屠杀
(北美，非正式)一级（或二级）谋杀
秘密（或者坏事）总要揭穿

phrases.phrase: scream (或 yell) blue (或 北美
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)大喊大叫地表示不满（或抗议、反对）

trans.tran_en: the crime of deliberately killing someone
the crime of deliberately killing someone
the crime of deliberately killing someone
to kill someone deliberately and illegally

trans.tran_cn: 谋杀， 屠杀； 破坏
trans.tran_en: to kill someone deliberately and illegally
